channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]The Lord Commander (Blue Dragon Special)[/color]
*Passive:* Loyal Until Death - You keep an Elite Blue Dragon Banner at your door, so if a Mastermind or Cult Leader attempts to convert you, they will be prevented from visiting you.
*Passive:* Sworn Vows - Due to an Oath you made upon becoming a Lord Commander, you are unable to step up to become King.
**Day Ability [Support]:** Lock-down - You will extend the current day phase into the night by 30 seconds, the night phase will be shortened by 30 seconds. - 2 uses.
**Day Ability [Investigative]:** Honour and Prestige - Target a player. You will be informed if they have Royal Blood. - 3 uses.
**Night Ability: Sworn to Protect [Support]** - Target a player. You will prevent any visits to them. - 2 uses.
**Night Ability: Distinction [Investigative]** - Target a player. You will be told if they are Convertible or Non-Convertible. You will also be told if they were just converted. - Infinite uses.
*Additional notes:* * Guaranteed to spawn and class is Unique. * Special because it can investigate and support Blue Dragon. * Distinction determines already converted players to be Non-Convertible. * Sworn to Protect will notify the same as Merc protection. * I know there are similarities to others classes, for example, Maid and Merc, I think this Class could benefit from those. * This Class will give Blue Dragon it's power class back since Sheriff and Paladin can now be converted while still being balanced in the way that it isn't giving BD any definitive "this is Unseen" or "this is Cult"
Image credits: GoT: SoIaF
![LordCommander|460x500](upload://fGP1uCJJDmxHHz55vv1lFVDePG0.jpg)
*Lore:*
"In all my years of service to the crown, I never once broke my oath. I serve the Dragon until I die."
The Lord Commander was a renowned veteran Knight. After many years of loyally serving the Blue Dragon, he took up an oath and swore fealty to his kingdom. It was clear to some that the Lord Commander was more than just an ordinary knight, he was something quite unique.
While being a veteran in combat, he was too frail to raise a sword. Instead, he used his skills in identifying the weak minded and the royals he abode with. He also used his veteran skills to protect others from visits.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
I would reccomend changing the lockdown to a day for the forum version.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander

agreed. Him knowing when a conversion attempt was made against him would be a good enough buff.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Doesn’t need death immunity, second part is good. Gives him a day to ask for protection from king or other bd etc

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Make him immune to death the night after a conversion attempt then (and informed when someone tries to convert him)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
You make that sound like a bad thing

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
If Mastermind sees “You could not convert your target” then it’ll make him a kill target for Assassin, same with Cult Leader seeing it, he’ll wanna kill them.

If they see “You were Occupied” then they’ll likely think twice about it.

The idea is to avoid being targeted because they can’t be converted.

Look way back at all the times Prince and Sheriff were involved in conversion attempts. They’d get killed off by the Assassin real quickly because the Mastermind would tell them, “Immune to convert” or something.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I am suggesting the visit one, because it makes the passive simple, and doesn’t really buff him as assassin won’t target the player the MM is converting.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

yes, you have stated it; you didn’t address the main issue. It is a complicated rule jumble, begging for bug reports.

suggestion on how to fix it:

Badge of honor: Immune to visits on nights when the MM or cult leader attempts to convert you

There is nothing complicated about it.

It works the exact same way as Butler’s concentrated wine.

Therefore, I will not be changing it.

Moleland:

You are missing the point. People will bug report this if it ever happens because it doesn’t feel right.

This happened when Butler’s concentrated wine occurred, eventually people started to understand what was going on and it’ll catch on.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
You are missing the point. People will bug report this if it ever happens because it doesn’t feel right.

I was suggesting the alternative instead of an occupy affect.

Read full topic

yes, you have stated it; you didn’t address the main issue. It is a complicated rule jumble, begging for bug reports.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Moleland:

I feel maybe the Lord Commander should get a message like “Someone tried to convert you, but you would not yield”

Combined with someone saying “I was occupied” followed by no Butler claims and it’s a simple “Hey, you tried to convert me last night” etc etc. I thought about that and I didn’t like it.

RopeStringFace:

except butler doesn’t bypass occupy immunity

Moleland:

You missed the point. Cult Leader ritualised is supposed to be occupy immune. If they start being occupied, expect the bug reports

ThePlex:

But should a situation arise that a Ritualist makes Cult Leader immune to Occupy on an attempted Brainwash, then hey, they find Lord Commander on that rare occasion.

I’ve already stated this.

Read full topic

item.description:
RopeStringFace:

I am saying it is complicated because ToL is already hard to learn. Teaching people a rule like this will be difficult.

Moleland:

The issue is that you’re begging for bug reports the rare occasion a Cult Leader gets blocked when ritualised

Butler’s Concentrated wine Occupies visitors. It’s not hard to understand a mechanic and if it works for Butler, then the code would be simple to copy onto another class.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

You’re only saying it looks complicated because you probably enjoy the simple minded things.

  1. No reason to insult me
  2. No, you are incorrect.

I am saying it is complicated because ToL is already hard to learn. Teaching people a rule like this will be difficult.

Not only that, but it is needless. Why can’t the lord commander be outed to them? They missed a night of conversion, they might as well be given a little information.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I made it that way on purpose.

If they try to convert him, and they see “Your target could not be converted.” they’ll be like “immune, we’ll kill him.” whereas in this case they’ll think twice and just assume they got Occupied.

You’re only saying it looks complicated because you probably enjoy the simple minded things. It ain’t changing. So cross that suggestion off your list.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander

item.description:
I think you needlessly made the conversion thing for the lord commander complicated. Just make him immune to conversion.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Enforcer doesn’t make Mastermind immune to Occupy.

Guarantees The Assassin will kill the target. Bypasses night Immunity, Occupying, and healing.

But should a situation arise that a Ritualist makes Cult Leader immune to Occupy on an attempted Brainwash, then hey, they find Lord Commander on that rare occasion.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
But unseen/cult members can make them immune

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lord Commander
item.dc:creator: ThePlex

Mastermind and Cult Leader aren’t Occupy immune.
